channel.title: Bot Analytics on Security365 Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Bot Analytics on Security365 Docs

item.title: Business
item.description: Super Bot Fight Mode (Business) AnalyticsBusiness and Enterprise customers without Bot Management can use Bot Analytics to dynamically examine bot traffic. These dashboards offer less functionality than Bot Management for Enterprise but still help you understand bot traffic on your domain. ​​ Access To use Bot Analytics, open the Cloudflare dashboard and select Security > Bots. ​​ Features For a full tour of Bot Analytics, see our blog post External link icon Open external link .

item.title: Enterprise Bot Management
item.description: Bot Management for Enterprise AnalyticsEnterprise customers with Bot Management can use Bot Analytics to dynamically examine bot traffic. ​​ Access To use Bot Analytics, open the Cloudflare dashboard and select Security > Bots. ​​ Features For a full tour of Bot Analytics, see our blog post External link icon Open external link . At a high level, the tool includes: Requests by bot score: View your total domain traffic and segment it vertically by traffic type.
